v8:item.v8:content: The item cannot contain grouping fields. Browse the structure tree and select a grouping to view or edit grouping field structure.
Assign the item with personal field settings
The item adopts selected fields from the report. In the report structure tree, select the item and then select required fields. To add custom fields, select the check box above.
Cannot add selected fields to the item. In the report structure tree, select the item and then select required fields.
Assign the item with personal filters to filter item records
No filter is assigned to the item. In the structure tree, select the report and edit report filters. To assign the item with a personal filter, select the check box above.
Cannot assign filters to the item. In the structure tree, select the report and edit report filters.
Assign the item with personal sorts to sort item records
No sort is assigned to the item. In the structure tree, select the report and edit report sorts. To assign the item with a personal sort, select the check box above.
Cannot assign sorts to the item. In the structure tree, select the report and edit report sorts.
Assign the item with personal conditional appearance to format item records

No conditional appearance is assigned to the item. In the structure tree, select the report and edit report conditional appearance. To assign the item with a personal conditional appearance, select the check box above.
Cannot assign conditional appearance to the item. In the structure tree, select the report and edit report conditional appearance.
Assign the item with personal additional settings

No additional settings are assigned to the item. In the structure tree, select the report and edit report additional settings. To assign the item with personal additional settings, select the check box above.
Cannot assign additional settings to the item. In the structure tree, select the report and edit additional report settings.
